summary: A tribe of Norse warriors traipse across a barren land after battle. Bloodied and wounded, their chief is near death. He is about to hand over power to his son when an army of a completely different kind descends upon them.
cast: Jean-Marc Chautems|Eileen Dunwoodie|Gísli Örn Garðarsson|Howard Lee|Raymond Mearns|Ingvar Sigurdsson|Ívar Örn Sverrisson|Dolly Wells
title: Tumult
